text: Büderich may refer to: *, a borough of Meerbusch, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany *Büderich (Werl), a borough of Werl, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany *Büderich (Wesel), a borough of Wesel, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany **Prisoner of War camp Büderich, a 1945 American POW camp in Büderich (Wesel) *Péry, formerly called Büderich in German, canton of Bern, Switzerland
title: Büderich
